name: @leo000001/opencode-quota-sidebar
description: OpenCode plugin that shows quota and token usage in session titles

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run typecheck && npm run build && npm test
scripts.test: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const {spawnSync}=require('child_process'); const dir=path.join('dist','__tests__'); const files=fs.existsSync(dir)?fs.readdirSync(dir).filter(f=>f.endsWith('.test.js')).map(f=>path.join(dir,f)):[]; if(files.length===0){ console.error('No test files found under dist/__tests__. Run: npm run build'); process.exit(1);} const res=spawnSync(process.execPath,['--test',...files],{stdio:'inherit'}); process.exit(typeof res.status==='number'?res.status:1);"
